cheeses.name: Cheddar
cheeses.description: A sharp tangy cheese perfect for sandwiches and snacking.

cheeses.name: Brie
cheeses.description: A soft creamy cheese with a mild flavor, great for spreading on crackers.

cheeses.name: Gouda
cheeses.description: A semi-hard cheese with a rich, caramel-like flavor.

cheeses.name: Blue Cheese
cheeses.description: A strong-flavored cheese with blue veins, perfect for salads and dressings.

charcuteries.name: Prosciutto
charcuteries.description: Thinly sliced Italian dry-cured ham with a delicate, buttery flavor.

charcuteries.name: Salami
charcuteries.description: A classic cured sausage with bold, savory spices.

charcuteries.name: Soppressata
charcuteries.description: A spicy cured Italian meat with rich, rustic flavor.

charcuteries.name: Chorizo
charcuteries.description: A smoky, spicy cured sausage perfect for tapas and boards.
